code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Alluser=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);async function getUsers(){try{let res=await axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:1214/api/User/users");setData(res.data.users);}catch(error){console.log(error);}}useEffect(()=>{getUsers();},[]);const Delete=async id=>{try{let res=await axios.delete("http://127.0.0.1:1214/api/User/delete/".concat(id));alert(res.data.Message);window.location.reload();}catch(error){}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[data.length==0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"No record found"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{cellPadding:10,className:"table table-hover container mt-5 text-dark ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center display-4 mt-5",children:"List of active clients"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Phone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"})]}),data.map(x=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Name," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Email," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Password," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Address," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[x.Phone," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:()=>Delete(x._id),children:" Delete "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success my-2",children:" Edit "})]})});})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admindashboard",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-dark",children:"Back to dashboard"})})})]});};export default Alluser;
